name: A Girl Named Fidget
description:
Originally conceived in 2017, this Dating Sim has been nearly untouched for the past two years. I don't know where to go with it, or how to go about fixing the problems it has, but I think some of it is amusing and funny, so I'm putting it up here. 

The main goal was to create a dumb meme sim which could be beaten in around 5 minutes or so, with path exploration making the experience hover around 20.

I will attempt to slowly update it at my leisure

THING TO NOTE: 

Almost ALL of the paths are currently broken or incomplete. You will need to delete your persistent data if you try to relaunch the game upon completing some them. Persistent data will be located under "A_girl_named_Fidget-1.0\game\saves"

The most functional path is the main one, where you focus solely on romancing her. 

Enjoy!
